examples.example: 那位热情的服务生微笑着为每一位顾客提供周到的服务。

translate.english: That enthusiastic waiter is smiling and providing meticulous service to every customer.

examples.example: 帅气的服务生礼貌又热情地为顾客介绍着菜品特色。

translate.english: The handsome waiter politely and enthusiastically introduces the characteristics of the dishes to the customers.

examples.example: 这位服务生一直秉持着热情的态度为顾客们服务，让人感觉格外亲切。

translate.english: This waiter/waitress has always adhered to an enthusiastic attitude to serve the customers, making people feel extraordinarily kind.
